Sentencas: Sr segregation is one of the key issues affecting the performance and durability of lanthanum strontium cobalt ferrite electrode (LSCF) for solid oxide cells (SOCs).
Titulo: Study on the strontium segregation behavior of lanthanum strontium cobalt ferrite electrode under compression

Sentencas: In this study, we investigated the Sr segregation behavior in LSCF under compression with purpose of simulating the operating condition of LSCF electrode in an assembled SOC stack.
Titulo: Study on the strontium segregation behavior of lanthanum strontium cobalt ferrite electrode under compression

Sentencas: The electrochemical performance of LSCF electrode in a symmetric cell was evaluated by impedance spectrometry.
Titulo: Study on the strontium segregation behavior of lanthanum strontium cobalt ferrite electrode under compression

Sentencas: The Sr segregation behavior on the surface of LSCF electrodes was investigated by energy-dispersive X-ray spectroscopy (EDX) and X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS).
Titulo: Study on the strontium segregation behavior of lanthanum strontium cobalt ferrite electrode under compression

Sentencas: It was confirmed that the compression load would suppress the formation of SrO on the surface of LSCF during long-term holding in air at 800 degrees C, resulting in significantly improved durability compared with the LSCF electrode without compression.
Titulo: Study on the strontium segregation behavior of lanthanum strontium cobalt ferrite electrode under compression

Sentencas: Furthermore, it was revealed that the type of materials (YSZ, GDC and Pt) in contact with LSCF would also affect the Sr segregation in LSCF.
Titulo: Study on the strontium segregation behavior of lanthanum strontium cobalt ferrite electrode under compression

Sentencas: In particular, contacting with YSZ under compression would induce more SrO formation on the surface of LSCF than GDC and Pt. (C) 2021 Hydrogen Energy Publications LLC.
Titulo: Study on the strontium segregation behavior of lanthanum strontium cobalt ferrite electrode under compression
